title: Ukulele Tuner with Machine Learning
description: In this challenge, I attempt to create a Ukulele tuner in JavaScript using p5.js, ml5.js and the pre-trained machine learning model CREPE: A Convolutional REpresentation for Pitch Estimation. Can you make one with a more elegant and creative interface?

timestamps.title: Using the CREPE model in the web editor
Create a pitch detector with ml5
The new keyword: constructors vs functions
Get a frequency value from the microphone
Make sure the microphone is ready first
Drawing the frequency in the canvas
Tuning the A string of the ukulele
Tuning the other strings of the ukulele
Figure out which note is the closest one

codeExamples.title: Ukulele Tuner in p5.js
codeExamples.description: Tuner for the notes A, E, C and G of a ukulele
